Package controllers

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
controllers.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAware, StageAware
public class MainController extends Object implements ClientAware, StageAware
Entry screen of BPARK. Allows the user to either continue as a guest or log in as a registered user. Also includes navigation controls to go back or exit the application.
